# Marathon Kids

## About this data

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(datasauRus)
library(dplyr)

q1 <- datasaurus_dozen %>% 
  mutate(group = rep(1:13,rep(142,13))) %>% 
  select(group, x, y) 
knitr::kable(head(q1), align = "ccc")


```

## More about this data

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
q2 <- q1  %>%  
  group_by(group) %>% 
  tally()
knitr::kable(q2, align = "ccc")
```
